pageContext.claim: “They supposedly told Crazy Bernie that Russia was looking at him, not me. This is all a big scam between Intel and the Democrats. They want Bernie OUT, & hate 'Trump'. It has been a scam right from the beginning with the illegally started Mueller Report, FISA, the leaking, lying & more. Schiff should not have access to Intelligence, he is a corrupt pol.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump with no evidence claims that the intelligence community is secretly working with Democrats to thwart the nomination of Sen. Bernie Sanders.
